an3.61:2.5: ca me → te ce me (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
an3.61:7.1: Ahetuappaccayaṃ → ahetuṃ appaccayaṃ (bj); ahetuṃ (si); ahetu (sya-all, km); ahetuappaccayā (pts-vp-pli1ed); ahetuṃ appaccayaṃ (mr)
an3.61:14.2: () → (byādhipi dukkho) (bj, mr); (vyādhi pi dukkhā) (pts-vp-pli1ed) | appiyehi sampayogo dukkho, piyehi vippayogo dukkho → etthantare pāṭho katthaci
